headline: Why Analysts Think Analog Devices Stock Can Hit $375 in 2026
summary: Analysts see Analog Devices benefiting from durable industrial demand, edge AI adoption, and margins that support a premium valuation into 2026.

headline: Analog Devices price target raised to $350 from $320 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on Analog Devices (ADI) to $350 from $320 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm raised price targets for most of its diversified analog semi stock coverage, noting that it expects modest calendar Q4 beats and Q1 raises across the board led by industrial semis given ongoing rebounds across most subsegments, favorable pricing, and robust growth in strategic AI businesses.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing t

headline: Electric Vehicle (EV) Battery Management Systems Market 2026-2031 - Rapid Scale-up in Global EV Production Sparks Modular BMS Adoption
summary: Dublin, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Electric Vehicle Battery Management System - Market Share Analysis, Industry Trends & Statistics, Growth Forecasts (2026-2031)" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. The Electric Vehicle Battery Management System (EV BMS) market is projected to achieve significant growth from USD 16.17 billion in 2025 to USD 49.83 billion by 2031, with a robust CAGR of 20.63% from 2026 to 2031. This growth is propelled by rapid vehicle electrification
